0: assert siegfried(5, "I am watching the children playing outside") == "I am vatching ze kinder playing outzide"
1: assert siegfried(5, "Phantom whatchamacallit will meet the wrath of the Kraken.") == "Fantom vatchamacallit vill meet ze wrath of ze Kraken."
2: assert siegfried(5, "The witching hour approaches, and the thunder will wrack.") == "Ze vitching our approaches, und ze zunder vill rack."
